Key Match Events: Blessing Muzarabani was stumped off the final ball of the match, but the keeper had taken the ball ahead of the stumps
Taskin Ahmed's blistering spell inspired the win that kept his side's semi-final hopes alive
Shakib Al Hasan ran out Williams with a turn and throw in one motion from his own bowling to seal the deal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win took Bangladesh to four points in Group Two but they are still to play India and Pakistan
Ahmed's haul made him the leading wicket taker in the Super 12 segment of the tournament to date, with eight
Others: Najmul Hossain Shanto (71 off 55 balls) had powered his team to 7-150 batting first
